# <a name="print-email-and-calendars"></a><span data-ttu-id="7b1e8-102">Mensagem de correio electrónico de impressão e calendários</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7b1e8-102">Print email and calendars</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7b1e8-103">Para imprimir uma mensagem de correio electrónico:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7b1e8-103">To print an email message:</span></span>
  
1. <span data-ttu-id="7b1e8-104">Seleccione a mensagem que pretende imprimir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7b1e8-104">Select the message you want to print.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="7b1e8-105">No canto superior direito da mensagem, seleccione três pontos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7b1e8-105">At the top right corner of the message, select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="7b1e8-106">e, em seguida, seleccione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7b1e8-106">and then select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="7b1e8-107">**Imprimir**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7b1e8-107">**Print**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7b1e8-108">Para imprimir o calendário:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7b1e8-108">To print your calendar:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="7b1e8-109">No canto superior direito da página, seleccione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7b1e8-109">At the top right corner of the page, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="7b1e8-110">**Imprimir**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7b1e8-110">**Print**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="7b1e8-111">Escolha o intervalo de vista e a hora e seleccione **Imprimir**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7b1e8-111">Choose the view and time range, and select **Print**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7b1e8-112">Mais informações sobre a [mensagem de correio electrónico de impressão e calendários no Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7b1e8-112">Learn more about how to [print email and calendars in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
